item.title: UALog
item.description: Challenge Solution A widely-used, open-source logging framework for Java applications, developed by an OSS Foundation was found to be vulnerable to a critical exploit. We require your excellent skills to figure out the vulnerable framework. package com.firstapp.register; import java.io.IOException; import javax.servlet.ServletException; import javax.servlet.annotation.WebServlet; import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet; import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest; import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse; import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager; import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger; @WebServlet("/log") public class doLog extends HttpServlet { private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L; // using log4j library 2.
